Quality Education.reason: The course is an example of quality education, designed through an academic-industry partnership to provide learning with 'theoretical depth and practical breadth'.
evidence: 由國立政治大學財務管理學系與永豐金融控股公司共同攜手開設本課程
設計出兼具理論深度與實務廣度的學習內容
致力於培養具備全方位視野與實務操作能力之金融控股專業人才

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: The course focuses on cultivating professional talent for the financial industry, enhancing their competitiveness and adaptability, and contributing to the 'sustainable development' of the financial market.
evidence: 致力於培養具備全方位視野與實務操作能力之金融控股專業人才
厚植其在金融控股集團內各事業體發展之競爭力與職場適應力
為台灣乃至國際金融市場未來之永續發展貢獻心力

創業投資

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course is fundamentally built on a partnership between a university and a private financial company, exemplifying an 'industry-academia cooperation mechanism' to achieve educational goals.
